member.name: T:SautinSoft.UseOffice
member.summary: The main class to convert between DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, ACCDB, CSV, RTF, Text, HTML and PDF documents with tables, images, fonts, colors, Unicode text etc.

member.name: T:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion
member.summary: Allows to get a current MS Office version.
member.remarks: The property is filled after the invoking of InitWord() method.

member.summary: An unknown version. Just in case, the property is filled after the invoking of InitWord() method.

member.summary: MS Office 2000. Integer value is 9.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.OfficeXP
member.summary: MS Office XP. Integer value is 10.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.Office2003
member.summary: MS Office 2003. Integer value is 11.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.Office2007
member.summary: MS Office 2007. Integer value is 12.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.Office2010
member.summary: MS Office 2010. Integer value is 14.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.Office2013
member.summary: MS Office 2013. Integer value is 15.

member.name: F:SautinSoft.UseOffice.eOfficeVersion.Office2016Or2019
member.summary: MS Office 2016/2019. Integer value is 16.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.IsPasswordProtected(System.String)
member.summary: Detects if a given Ms Office document is protected by a password or not. Supported formats: Word, Excel and PowerPoint (both legacy and OpenXml).
member.param: Path to a MS Office document.
member.returns: True if document is protected by a password, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.IsPasswordProtected(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Detects if a given MS Office document is protected by a password or not. Supported formats: Word, Excel and PowerPoint (both legacy and OpenXml).
member.param: MS Office document as a byte array.
member.returns: True if document is protected by a password, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.IsPasswordProtected(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Detects if a given Ms Office document is protected by a password or not. Supported formats: Word, Excel and PowerPoint (both legacy and OpenXml).
member.returns: True if document is protected by a password, false otherwise.

member.summary: Creates object of class CSheet. By default all sheets from workbook will be converted

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.FitSheetToPage
member.summary: Sets or gets to fit each sheet to page size.Thus, an each Excel sheet will take an one page.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.AllSheets
member.summary: Convert all sheets from workbook

example.code: Dim u As SautinSoft.UseOffice = New UseOffice() If u.InitExcel() = 0 Then u.Sheets.All() u.ConvertFile("D:\Workbook.xlsx", "d:\Result.pdf", UseOffice.eDirection.XLSX_to_PDF) 'Make other conversions .... u.CloseExcel() End If

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.SheetNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows to set custom sheet for converting by its number
member.remarks: Use this method when you want to convert only a single worksheet which has references to other sheets.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.SheetNumbers(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Allows to specify custom sheets to convert by their numbers

code.source: ..\Packages\UseOffice .Net\Code samples\CSharp\Convert custom Excel sheets to PDF\sample.cs
code.title: How to convert custom Excel sheets to a PDF document in C#

code.source: ..\Packages\UseOffice .Net\Code samples\VB.Net\Convert custom Excel sheets to PDF\sample.vb
code.title: How to convert custom Excel sheets to a PDF document in VB.Net

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.SheetNames(System.String[])
member.summary: Allows to specify custom sheets to convert by their names

example.code: Dim u As SautinSoft.UseOffice = New UseOffice() If u.InitExcel() = 0 Then u.Sheets.Custom(New String () {"Page 1", "Table"}) u.ConvertFile("D:\Workbook.xlsx", "d:\Result.pdf", UseOffice.eDirection.XLSX_to_PDF) 'Make other conversions .... u.CloseExcel() End If

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CExcelOptions.SheetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows to specify custom sheets from X to Y

example.code: Dim u As SautinSoft.UseOffice = New UseOffice() If u.InitExcel() = 0 Then u.Sheets.Range(5,7) u.ConvertFile("D:\Workbook.xlsx", "d:\Result.pdf", UseOffice.eDirection.XLSX_to_PDF) 'Make other conversions .... u.CloseExcel() End If

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.InitOffice
member.summary: Loads MS Office® library (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint) from memory
member.returns:
0 - Loading successfully
1 - Can't load MS Excel (Word and PowePoint are loaded successfully)
10 - Can't load MS Word (Excel and PowerPoint are loaded successfully)
11 - Can't load MS Word and Excel (PowerPoint loaded successfully)
100 - Can't load MS PowerPoint (Excel and Word are loaded successfully)
101 - Can't load MS Excel and PowerPoint (Word loaded successfully)
110 - Can't load PowerPoint and Word (Excel loaded successfully)
111 - Can't load MS Office

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.KillProcesses(System.String)
member.summary: Terminates process by its name
member.remarks:
Beware: this function kill all processes with specified name.
If the MS Word, Excel or PowerPoint processes are still in memory you can use this method to terminate them.

member.summary: Set activation key
member.remarks: After purchasing you will get the full version of product and your serial number. This parameter doesn't have any effect in the trial version. This parameter is necessary in full version, please don't forget to specify it by your serial number.

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.TemporaryDirectory
member.summary: Set a custom temporary directory for the method ConvertBytes(...).
member.remarks: By default the conversion process with help of the ConvertBytes(...) will be done using temporary files inside the temp folder of current user.

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.ProcessesID
member.summary: Gets the list with ID of all processes which were started by UseOffice .Net.
member.remarks: Even if the process is closed now, it will be persist this list because it was started by our UseOffice .Net.

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.OfficeVersion
member.summary: Gets the MS Office version.

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.Exceptions
member.summary: Allows to get the list of all exceptions which appeared during of the conversion process.

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.CreateTraceFile
member.summary: Forces the component to create a tracing file
member.remarks:
This file contains a debug info to determine possible issues during converting.
Default value: False
By default a tracing file will be created at "c:\useoffice-trace.txt", you can specify any path using the property .

example.code: Dim u As New SautinSoft.UseOffice() u.CreateTraceFile = True u.TraceFilePath = "d:\trace.txt"

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.TraceFilePath
member.summary: Path for creating a tracing file
member.remarks:
This file contains a debug info to determine possible issues during converting.
Default value: "c:\useoffice-trace.txt"

example.code: Dim u As New SautinSoft.UseOffice() u.CreateTraceFile = True u.TraceFilePath = "d:\trace.txt"

member.name: P:SautinSoft.UseOffice.DisableMacros
member.summary: Disable all macros during conversion of Word, Excel and PowerPoint documents.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.ConvertBytes(System.Byte[],SautinSoft.UseOffice.eDirection)
member.summary: Converts a document to another format in memory, see supported .
member.param: Input document as a byte array.
member.remarks:
Note: Actually the conversion process will be done using temporary files inside the temp folder of current user.
The temporary files will be removed immediately after the conversion process.
member.returns:
null - in case of conversion failed.
array of bytes containing the document in desired format - in case of successful conversion.

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.ConvertFile(System.String,System.String,SautinSoft.UseOffice.eDirection)
member.summary: Converts a one file to a file with another format, see supported
member.param: A full local path to a file which you want to convert
A full local path to create output file
member.returns:
0 - Converting successfully
1 - Can't open input file. Check that you are using full local path to input file, URL and relative path are not supported
2 - Can't create output file. Please check that you have permissions to write by this path or probably this path already used by another application
3 - Converting failed, please contact with our Support Team
4 - MS Office isn't installed. The component requires that any of these versions of MS Office should be installed: 2000, XP, 2003, 2007 or 2010

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.PrintPdf(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the PDF file using default printer
member.remarks: To print PDF file the component will use the Acrobat Reader. Please be sure that you have Acrobat Reader installed in your system.
member.param: Path PDF file which you want to print
Time in seconds for launching Acrobat Reader
Time in seconds for sending PDF document on print

member.name: M:SautinSoft.UseOffice.PrintPdf(System.String)
member.summary: Prints the PDF file using default printer
member.remarks: To print PDF file the component will use the Acrobat Reader. Please be sure that you have Acrobat Reader installed in your system.
member.param: Path PDF file which you want to print
